amendment.description: Page 87, line 4, strike the close quotation marks and the period at the end. \ Page 87, after line 4, insert the following: \ "(11) Head Start agencies may develop or maintain partnerships with institutions of higher education and non-profit organizations that recruit, train, place, and support college students to serve as mentors and reading coaches to preschool children in Head Start programs.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-229 to allow Head Start centers to develop or maintain partnerships with institutions of higher education and non-profit organizations to support college students that serve as mentors and reading coaches to preschool children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
